title: Waterproof Battery Holder with 150mm Cable
blurb:
Simply add your own AA batteries and you have a 6V power source to power your gadgets when mains power is not available. It is water and dustproof, so it can be used outdoors, which could include powering outdoor weather sensors, tank level meters, door entry buzzers, decretive LED lighting, etc.
- High impact resistant ABS plastic enclosure with a nylon cable gland
- Rated IP68 to provide protection against oil, dust and water
- Enclosure is secured by brass nuts moulded in the interior of the base with 4 x supplied self tapping screws
